item.title: Hidden Shortcuts For Mac Users
item.description: Command-Z: Undo the previous command Shift-Command-Z: Redo Command-E: Eject the selected disk or volume Shiftâ€“C: Open the Computer window Command-Control-D: Look up a word in dictionary
